issue.title: [C++] "arrow/engine/api.h" exposes internal headers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17517](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17517). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Public API headers should not transitively include internal headers.
This is ideally tested in `public_api_test.cc`.
